content: They are pretty rare, and there are only a few different ones hidden throughout the game’s chapters, so you will need to keep an eye out to get them all or find the best Gourd to use.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gourds.md', within the main section titled 'Gourds'.
The content is as follows:
They are pretty rare, and there are only a few different ones hidden throughout the game’s chapters, so you will need to keep an eye out to get them all or find the best Gourd to use.
